translation.en: You had rations for two weeks.
You were inside for nearly four months.
translation.fr: et vous y êtes restée quatre mois.
Je ne me rappelle pas manger.

translation.en: How long did you think you were inside?
translation.fr:
Combien de temps
pensez-vous y être restée ?

- Je ne sais pas.
- Et à Sheppard ?

translation.en: Like all cells, it is born from an existing cell.
translation.fr:
Comme toute cellule,
elle a été créée à partir d'une autre.

translation.en: all cells were ultimately born from one cell.
translation.fr:
toutes les cellules ont été créées
à partir d'une seule.

translation.en: A single organism alone on planet Earth,

translation.fr: Il y environ quatre milliards d'années,

translation.en: one became two, two became four.
The rhythm of the dividing pair...
translation.fr: L e rythme de division cellulaire

translation.en: which becomes the structure of every microbe,
translation.fr:
qui devint la structure même
de chaque microbe,

translation.en: blade of grass, sea creature, land creature...
The structure of everything that lives...
translation.fr: La structure de tout organisme qui vit...

translation.en: As students of medicine, as the doctors of tomorrow,
translation.fr:
C'est là que vous,
étudiants en médecine, futurs médecins, intervenez.

translation.en: this is where you come in.
The cell we're looking at is from a tumor.
translation.fr:
La cellule que nous étudions
provient d'une tumeur.

translation.en: Female patient, early 30s, taken from the cervix.
translation.fr:
Femme, dans la trentaine,
cellules du col de l'utérus.

translation.en: Over the course of the next term,
we will be closely examining cancer cells in vitro
translation.fr:
nous examinerons
les cellules cancéreuses in vitro

translation.en: [Katie] I read the John Sulston paper last night.
translation.fr: Hier, j'ai lu l'article de John Sulston.

translation.en: [Dan] I've been looking for you at lunch, but you never seem to be around.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai cherchée ce midi,
mais tu n'es jamais là.

translation.en: I've been catching up on some writing.
All work and no play, it sounds... not healthy.
translation.fr:
L'effort sans le réconfort,
ce n'est pas bon.
as-tu quelque chose de prévu samedi ?

translation.en: Sarah and I have a few people over.
translation.fr: Sarah et moi organisons une garden-party,

translation.en: A garden party while the weather holds.
Thanks, Dan, I really appreciate it, but I'm going to paint our bedr--
translation.fr:
Merci, Dan, c'est gentil,
mais je dois peindre notre...

translation.en: You're allowed to come to a barbecue. It is not a betrayal
translation.fr: Tu peux aller à un barbecue, tu ne trahis ni n'insultes sa mémoire.

translation.en: or an insult to his memory.
translation.fr: tu ne trahis ni n'insultes sa mémoire.

translation.en: -♪ Confusion has its cost ♪ -Oh, my God. Oh, my God!
-♪ Who lingers ♪ -Oh, my God. I thought you were gone. ♪ Saying she is lost ♪
translation.fr: Je croyais que tu étais mort.

translation.en: No one knew anything about your unit.
translation.fr: On était sans nouvelles de ton unité.

translation.en: The other partners knew just as little as me.
Okay, yeah, it was covert. Yeah, I think so.
I-- I don't know where it was, or...
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas où on était ou...

translation.en: How is that possible? [stammers] Was it warm?
Did the people there speak Portuguese, or Swahili, or Pashto?
translation.fr:
On y parlait le portugais,
le swahili ou l'afghan ?

translation.en: How long have you been back?
How'd you get back? What base did you fly into?
translation.fr:
Comment es-tu rentré ?
Sur quelle base ?

translation.en: -I don't know. -Your unit, did they come back with you?
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Et les autres ? Ils sont rentrés ?

translation.en: You must be able to tell me something.
You vanished off the face of the earth for 12 months.
translation.fr: Tu as disparu pendant un an.

translation.en: I deserve a better explanation than no explanation.
No, I was outside the room.

translation.fr: Je ne me sens pas très bien.

translation.en: Stay with me, baby. -[coughing] -I'm right here with you.
translation.fr:
Reste avec moi, bébé.
Je suis là, avec toi.

Homme, 31 ans, hémorragie,
en pleine crise.

translation.en: Stay with me, baby. I love you.
translation.fr: Reste avec moi, bébé. Je t'aime.

translation.en: Baby, look at me. Can you do something?!
[paramedic] You call for a police escort?
[paramedic] What are you doing? You can't move him!
translation.fr: Que faites-vous ? Ne le déplacez pas !

translation.en: Let him go! Let him go!
It's a hangover from the sedative you were given.
translation.fr: Ce sont les effets secondaires du sédatif.

translation.en: Why am I talking to a psychologist?
Am I in a psychiatric hospital?
You served in the military for seven years.
translation.fr:
Vous avez été dans l'armée
pendant sept ans.

translation.en: I'm a professor from Johns Hopkins.
I want to know what the fuck I'm doing here.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce que je fous ici, bordel ?

translation.en: Your research area is the genetically programmed life cycle of a cell.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes spécialisée dans le cycle
cellulaire génétiquement programmé.

translation.en: Yeah, I'd like to talk about Sergeant Kane.
translation.fr:
Justement,
je voulais vous parler du Sergent Kane.

translation.en: When did he arrive back home?
-I want to see a lawyer. -You're not gonna be able to.
translation.fr:
- Je veux voir un avocat.
- Ça ne va pas être possible.

translation.en: Did he explain how he got back?
-No. -Did he contact you at any point
[Ventress] What did he tell you about his mission when he returned?
translation.fr: Que vous a-t-il confié sur sa mission ?

translation.en: Did he ever mention where he was going, what he was doing?
translation.fr:
A-t-il mentionné l'objet
ou le lieu de sa mission ?

translation.en: He never said, I never asked.
But you made regular requests for information from his unit CO.
translation.fr:
Pourtant vous avez souvent demandé
des nouvelles à son commandant.

translation.en: Until six months ago, and then you stopped.
translation.fr:
Jusqu'à il y a six mois.
Puis vous avez cessé.

translation.en: Why was that? Thought he was dead?
translation.fr: Pourquoi ça ? Vous le croyiez mort ?

translation.en: It's not easy to move on.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas facile de tourner la page.
Ça n'a pas été le cas.

translation.en: I'm done answering questions. It's your turn.
translation.fr: Finies les questions. À mon tour.

translation.en: He must have been exposed to some sort of radiation,
translation.fr: Il a dû être exposé à des radiations

translation.en: You have to tell me where he was, what he was doing.
translation.fr:
Révélez-moi le lieu
et l'objet de sa mission.

translation.en: It started around three years ago.
translation.fr: Ça a commencé il y a presque trois ans.

translation.en: Blackwater National Park reported that a lighthouse was surrounded
translation.fr:
Le Blackwater National Park a signalé
un phare enveloppé

d'un miroitement,
selon leurs propres termes.

translation.en: One of the wardens went in to investigate.
translation.fr:
L'un des gardiens du parc
a mené l'enquête.

translation.en: Since then, we've approached by land, by sea,
translation.fr:
On a depuis envoyé des drones,
des animaux,

translation.en: sent in drones, animals, and teams of people.
translation.fr: des équipes, par la mer, par la terre,

translation.en: And the boundary's getting bigger. It's expanding.
So far, it's eating into barely populated swampland,
translation.fr:
Pour le moment,
seuls les marais sont touchés,

translation.en: which, you know, we evacuated under the pretext of a chemical spill,
translation.fr:
on les a évacués sous prétexte
d'un déversement chimique.

translation.en: but... that won't last much longer.
In a few months, the area will have grown to where we are right now.
translation.fr:
Dans quelques mois, elle aura atteint
l'endroit où nous nous trouvons.
Puis ce sera au tour des villes...
Vous avez dit que rien ne revient.

translation.en: We need to come to an agreement about what to do with you.
translation.fr: Nous devons décider de votre sort.

translation.en: You're not going to let me go home?
translation.fr: Vous ne me laissez pas partir ?

translation.en: Is that what you want? To go home?
translation.fr: C'est ce que vous voulez ? Partir ?

translation.en: I want to be with him.
I was just looking at the moon.
It's always so weird seeing it like that in the daylight.
translation.fr: C'est bizarre de la voir en plein jour.
On dirait que Dieu a oublié

translation.en: somewhat key to the whole "being a god" thing.
translation.fr:
C'est un élément clé
de la création divine.

translation.en: You know he's listening right now, don't you?
circumvent the Hayflick limit, you can prevent senescence.
translation.fr:
contourne la limite de Hayflick,
et finie la sénescence.

translation.en: I was about to make the exact same point.
translation.fr: C'est exactement ce que j'allais dire.

translation.en: It means the cell doesn't grow old, it becomes immortal.
translation.fr:
La cellule ne vieillit donc pas
et devient immortelle.

translation.en: They say aging is a natural process, but it's actually a fault in our genes.
translation.fr:
Vieillir n'est pas un processus naturel,
mais une anomalie génétique.

translation.en: I get really turned on when you patronize me. It's really hot.
translation.fr:
Tu m'excites
quand tu me prends de haut. Sexy.

translation.en: Without it, I could keep looking like this forever.
translation.fr:
Je pourrais ressembler 
à ça pour toujours.

translation.en: Oh, okay. -Well, that could constitute a mistake. -[laughs]
translation.fr: On pourrait appeler ça une erreur.

translation.en: You didn't tell me where you're heading this time.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'as pas dit où tu allais.

translation.en: I know there's something strange about this mission.
The silence around it is louder than usual.
translation.fr:
Le silence qui l'entoure est
plus bruyant que d'habitude.

translation.en: Kind of angling for a clue here.
translation.fr: Je vais à la pêche aux indices là.

translation.en: We'll be under the same hemisphere.
translation.fr: On sera sur le même hémisphère.

translation.en: It tells you that if you step outside and you look up...
translation.fr:
Quand tu sortiras
et que tu lèveras les yeux...

translation.en: we'll be looking at the same stars.

translation.fr:
- Tu te fous de moi ?
- Quoi ?

translation.en: You think that's what I do while you're away?
translation.fr:
Tu crois que je fais ça
quand tu es absent ?

translation.en: -What? -You think I'm out in the garden,
translation.fr:
- Quoi ?
- Tu crois que je suis dans le jardin,

translation.en: pining, looking up at the sky?
-[scoffs] Shut up. All right. -Oh, to think my beloved Kane...
translation.fr:
- Tais-toi.
- Quand je pense que mon cher Kane...

translation.en: -Okay. Uh-huh. -...is looking at the selfsame moon.
translation.fr: que mon cher Kane... observe la même lune.
Mon bel ami céleste et lointain...
prends soin de mon brave soldat.

translation.en: Jesus. You know what? You are disrespectful,
translation.fr: Tu sais quoi ? Tu es irrespectueuse

translation.en: seriously, not only to your former comrades in the armed forces,
translation.fr:
non seulement envers
tes anciens camarades de l'armée,

translation.en: -but also to the president. -You forgot the flag.
translation.fr:
- mais aussi le Président.
- Et le drapeau.

translation.en: Oh, I'm getting-- I'm getting to the motherfucking flag.
translation.fr: Oui, j'y viens à ce putain de drapeau !

translation.en: [woman] She's all by herself. Don't you think we should make friends?
translation.fr:
Elle n'a personne.
On devrait lui parler, non ?

translation.en: -[woman 2] Well, obviously you should. -[woman] Yep, I'll do it.
translation.fr:
- Tu devrais, oui.
- OK, j'y vais.

- Je dérange ?
- Non, pas du tout.

translation.en: You know, I always see you here alone. It's...
translation.fr: Vu que tu es toujours seule...

translation.en: I'm guessing you probably feel weird or awkward.
translation.fr:
Tu te sens peut-être bizarre
ou mal à l'aise.
Non, sérieusement, il ne faut pas.

translation.en: The people here put themselves to sleep in the fetal position
translation.fr:
Ici, les gens s'endorment
en position fœtale

translation.en: Um, why don't you come and meet my crew?
translation.fr: Viens, je te présente à l'équipe.

translation.en: [Lena and woman] Hi nice to meet you.
Yeah, that's Cassie Sheppard, and Josie Radek.
translation.fr:
Voici Cassie Sheppard
et Josie Radek.

translation.en: -[Cassie] Do you want to have a seat? -Thank you.
-So, first day at the Southern Reach. -Yes.
translation.fr:
- Premier jour chez Southern Reach.
- Oui.

translation.en: Um, yeah, right from the start.
I've been testing the magnetic fields around the boundary,
translation.fr:
J'ai analysé les champs magnétiques
autour de la frontière,

translation.en: which is like using confetti to test a hurricane.
translation.fr:
ce qui reviendrait à analyser 
un ouragan avec des confettis.

translation.en: Uh, and I've been here... ten months.
Tried to join an NGO, but my application got flagged, so Southern Reach got me.
translation.fr:
J'ai postulé auprès d'une ONG,
mais j'ai fini à Southern Reach.

translation.en: Only two months. I'm a physicist.
translation.fr:
Juste deux mois. Je suis physicienne, recrutée
à la sortie de mon doctorat.

translation.en: I came straight from my Cambridge postdoc.
translation.fr:
Je suis physicienne, recrutée
à la sortie de mon doctorat.

translation.en: Uh, I'm from Johns Hopkins, biologist.
We had a bet on your profession, and Josie had biologist, of course.
translation.fr:
On essayait de deviner ton métier.
Josie a dit biologiste.

translation.en: -I had law enforcement. -I had you as single.
translation.fr:
- Et moi, policière.
- Et moi, célibataire.

translation.en: Jesus. Do you have to hit on everyone, like all the time?
translation.fr:
Faut vraiment
que tu dragues tout le monde, toi.

translation.en: I think I'm allowed to roll the dice a few more times. [chuckles]
translation.fr: autant en profiter une dernière fois.

translation.en: Well, yeah, um, crazy as it seems...
translation.fr: Aussi fou que ça puisse paraître...

translation.en: -You're going into the Shimmer? -Six days and counting.
translation.fr:
- Dans le miroitement ?
- Dans six jours.

translation.en: The previous teams have been largely military, so, yeah.
translation.fr:
L'équipe précédente se composait
surtout de militaires... Oui.

translation.en: What do you think happened to them?
Well, there are two theories of what went wrong in the Shimmer.
Two, they go crazy and kill each other.
translation.fr: Deux, pris de folie, ils s'entre-tuent.

translation.en: [Josie] There was one military guy who made it out.
translation.fr: L'un des militaires s'en est sorti.

translation.en: Yeah, but you heard about the state that he was in.
I know why you went in.
translation.fr: Je sais pourquoi tu y es allé.

translation.en: And I know what I have to do.
translation.fr: Je sais ce qu'il me reste à faire.

translation.en: [Ventress] So you didn't tell them about your connection to Sergeant Kane?
translation.fr:
Vous n'avez pas dévoilé
votre lien avec le Sergent Kane ?

translation.en: [Lena] I thought it would complicate things.
translation.fr: Ça aurait pu compliquer les choses.

translation.en: Why are you going into the Shimmer?
The mission statement is to reach the supposed source of the Shimmer,
translation.fr:
La mission est d'atteindre la source supposée du miroitement,
le phare,

translation.en: the lighthouse, enter and acquire data, and return.
translation.fr:
la source supposée du miroitement,
le phare, y entrer, recueillir
des données et revenir.

translation.en: But I don't think that that's your mission statement.
translation.fr:
Je pense que ce n'est pas
ce qui vous y pousse.

translation.en: I've been watching the phenomenon for a while now.
translation.fr:
Ça fait un moment
que j'observe ce phénomène.
Je dresse le profil des volontaires.

translation.en: There's only so long one can do that.
But you need to know what's inside?
translation.fr: Vous devez savoir ce qui s'y trouve.
Voilà ce qui complique les choses.

translation.en: You want to come with us.
I can't do anything for him here.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas l'aider ici.

translation.en: You requested to join the mission.
You knew all other missions had failed
and the only survivor was barely surviving.
translation.fr:
et l'état dans lequel
se trouvait le survivant.

translation.en: I'm only trying to understand what drove you.
translation.fr: Je veux juste comprendre vos motivations.

translation.en: [Anya] And then we get some real meals.

translation.fr: Des spaghettis. Voilà les biscuits salés de Radek.

translation.en: Wow, cornbread. That's not so bad.
translation.fr: Du pain au maïs, pas mal.

translation.en: You gotta give me a second. I'm a little disoriented.
translation.fr: Une minute, je suis un peu désorientée.

translation.en: You don't remember setting up camp, do you?
translation.fr: Tu ne te rappelles pas du camp ?

translation.en: I don't remember anything... after we reached the tree line.
translation.fr:
Je ne me souviens de rien
passée l'orée de la forêt.

translation.en: And we did a food inventory.
From the depletion, we've been out here for at least three or four days.
translation.fr: il semblerait que nous soyons là depuis au moins trois ou quatre jours.

translation.en: Guys, I've been checking my comms and nav equipment.
translation.fr:
J'ai vérifié mon matériel
de communication et de navigation.

translation.en: They boot up fine, no problem with the electronics,
but anything that sends a signal out of the Shimmer... is down.
translation.fr:
Mais impossible de capter
tout signal provenant de l'extérieur.

translation.en: Even though we've probably got about 20 satellites above us right now,
translation.fr:
Et ce, malgré les 20 satellites
au-dessus de nous.

translation.en: So we've got no compass, no comms, no coordinates...
translation.fr:
On n'a ni boussole,
ni communication, ni coordonnées...

translation.en: Well, we know we're in the state park.
translation.fr: On est dans le parc territorial.

translation.en: We head south, we hit the ocean,
translation.fr: Allons au sud, vers la mer,

translation.en: then we can just follow the shoreline until we hit the perimeter wall. Right?
translation.fr:
puis, longeons la côte
jusqu'au mur d'enceinte, OK ?

translation.en: -How do we know what's south? -Come on, Josie, you know this.
translation.fr:
- Comment trouver le sud ?
- Tu le sais, voyons.

translation.en: Split the difference between the hour hand and 12, south.
translation.fr:
Divise l'angle entre l'aiguille
et le 12 en deux. C'est le sud.

translation.en: We weren't really expecting the comms equipment to work, were we?
translation.fr:
On ne comptait pas vraiment
sur notre matériel de toute façon.

translation.en: There's been three years of expeditions and three years of radio silence.
translation.fr: Surtout après 3 ans d'expéditions et trois ans de silence radio.

translation.en: Let's pack up and get moving.
We've already lost a lot of the day.
translation.fr: On a perdu assez de temps.

translation.en: [Anya] Oh, I'm gonna check this out. Get us out of this damn swamp.
translation.fr:
Je vais vérifier ça.
Qu'on sorte de ce marais.

translation.en: [Ventress] All right. Let's check out the hut.
translation.fr: D'accord. Jetons un œil à la cabane.

translation.en: Looks like someone's about to have a wedding.
translation.fr: On dirait qu'un mariage se prépare.

translation.en: To look at them, you wouldn't say that they're the same species.
translation.fr:
On ne dirait pas qu'elles appartiennent
à la même espèce.

translation.en: But they're growing from the same branch structure...
translation.fr:
Mais elles poussent
depuis la même branche,

translation.en: so it has to be the same species.
translation.fr: donc il s'agit forcément de la même.

translation.en: It's like they're stuck in a continuous mutation.
translation.fr:
Comme si elles étaient
en constante mutation.

translation.en: you'd sure as hell call it a pathology if you saw this in a human.
translation.fr:
Si on voyait ça sur un humain,
ce serait le mot.

translation.en: No. It's been long abandoned, maybe even before--
translation.fr:
Rien, à l'abandon depuis longtemps,
bien avant...

translation.en: -[Lena] Help me with her! -[Anya] What's going on?
[Anya] Let's sit you down. Help me with her bag.
translation.fr: On va t'asseoir. Prenez son sac.

translation.en: Okay, just breathe. It's okay. You're just fine.
-What the hell happened? -Something in the water.
translation.fr:
- C'était quoi ?
- Un truc dans l'eau.

translation.en: It's exactly the same as the flowers.
Something here is making giant waves in the gene pool.
translation.fr:
Quelque chose ici met le bazar
dans le patrimoine génétique.

translation.en: Sharks have teeth like that, don't they?
translation.fr: On dirait des dents de requins.

translation.en: Do you think it's a crossbreed?
You can't crossbreed between different species.
The mutations were subtle at first.
translation.fr: Au début, les mutations étaient subtiles.

translation.en: More extreme as we grew closer to the lighthouse.
translation.fr:
Mais plus on approchait du phare,
moins elles l'étaient.

translation.en: Is it possible these were hallucinations?

translation.fr: Je me suis posé la question.

translation.en: But they were shared among all of us.
translation.fr: Mais on voyait toutes la même chose.

translation.en: [clicks tongue] Must have gotten that from the gator.
translation.fr: À cause du croco sans doute.

translation.en: So, where'd you learn to shoot?
I was in the military before I was an academic.
translation.fr:
Avant la recherche,
j'étais dans l'armée.

translation.en: Feels like a lifetime ago now.
All other lives feel like a lifetime ago.
translation.fr: Toute autre vie paraît bien loin.

translation.en: We were kids, I was married.
Which do you carry around your neck? A husband or a child?
translation.fr:
Qui portes-tu autour de ton cou ?
Ton mari ou ton enfant ?

translation.en: He was in the army, too. That's...
Guess there had to be something.
It's not exactly something you do if your life is in... perfect harmony.
translation.fr:
C'est que ta vie
n'est pas forcément idyllique.
On est toutes dans le même cas.

translation.en: 'cause she doesn't want you to see the scars on her forearms.
translation.fr:
car elle veut cacher
les cicatrices sur ses bras.

translation.en: No, I think the opposite, trying to feel alive.
translation.fr: Non, le contraire, pour se sentir en vie.

translation.en: Yeah. As far as anyone knows...
no friends, no family, no partner, no children.
translation.fr:
pas d'amis, de famille,
de compagnon ou d'enfants.

translation.en: No concession in her at all.

translation.fr: Et toi ? J'ai aussi perdu quelqu'un.

translation.en: In a way, it's two bereavements.
translation.fr: C'est une sorte de double deuil.

translation.en: and the person I once was.
This used to be the headquarters of the Southern Reach.
translation.fr:
Ça devait être le quartier général
de l'agence.

translation.en: Is that the old mess hall?
There's beds and bags. You think people are here?
translation.fr:
Des lits et des sacs.
Il y a des gens ici ?

translation.en: Yeah, I'm gonna go with the past tense.
This shit is heavy. Can't carry this.
translation.fr:
C'est super lourd.
Je ne peux pas la porter.

translation.en: Lena, what you got going on?
Those were the soldiers on the last expedition.
Looks like they were using this room as their base of operations.
translation.fr: Cet endroit devait leur servir de base.

translation.en: Why are some of the names crossed out?
-This is a plan view of the base, right? -[Cassie] Yep. This is the mess hall.
translation.fr: C'est une vue en plan de la base, non ? Ici, le mess.

translation.en: I think that the times by the names are a guard rota, so...
translation.fr:
Les heures à côté des noms
sont des tours de garde.

translation.en: if they were guarding the perimeter, we should.
This might be able to tell us something.
translation.fr: On pourrait tirer quelque chose de ça.
Soit nous, si je ne m'abuse.

translation.en: I should be able to play this.
Okay, so we know what happened to the last group. They went insane.
translation.fr: On a compris, ils sont devenus fous.
Il y avait un truc en vie dans cet homme.

translation.en: -That was a trick of the light. -[Cassie] What?
[Anya] I've been a paramedic for 10 years. I've scraped people off the road.
translation.fr: Après 10 ans dans les secours, j'ai ramassé de tout.

translation.en: You see some weird shit. That was a trick of the light.
translation.fr:
Tu vois de sacrés trucs.
C'était une illusion.

translation.en: -[Josie] His insides were moving. -[Anya] No, it was shock.
translation.fr:
- Ses tripes bougeaient.
- Tu es sous le choc.

translation.en: -That was a shock response. -[Cassie] Watch it again.
translation.fr:
- Tu réagis au choc.
- Regarde encore.

translation.en: [Anya] No, I'm not gonna watch it again!
translation.fr:
- Ça ne va pas !
- Ce n'était pas des intestins

translation.en: [Cassie] That was not intestines. It was a worm--
translation.fr:
- Ça ne va pas !
- Ce n'était pas des intestins - mais plutôt un ver...
- Eh bien, regarde-le !

translation.en: [Anya] Okay, then you watch it, Sheppard!
translation.fr:
- mais plutôt un ver...
- Eh bien, regarde-le !

- Elle est allée où ?
- Par ici.

translation.en: -I don't want to stay here tonight. -We don't have a choice.
translation.fr:
- Je ne veux pas rester ici.
- On n'a pas le choix.

translation.en: It's too late in the day for us to move on.
translation.fr: Il est trop tard pour bouger aujourd'hui.

translation.en: I gotta leave a day early.
But we had a whole day planned.
-We were gonna drive to the country-- -No, we can't.
translation.fr:
- d'aller à la campagne.
- Je ne peux pas.

- On ne peut pas.
- Même pas...

translation.en: It's good Josie's getting some rest.
With the help of a little sedative.
How about you? Get some sleep?
translation.fr: Et toi ? Tu ne dors pas ?

translation.en: I'm at least as freaked as Josie.
translation.fr: Je suis aussi terrifiée que Josie.

translation.en: What're you doing up? Not supposed to relieve me until 3:00.
translation.fr: Que faites-vous ici ? Il n'est pas 3 h.

translation.en: I'm done sleeping for the night.
Okay, this is where we are...
It's a small community we evacuated two years ago.
translation.fr:
Une petite communauté
évacuée il y a deux ans.

translation.en: I think we should head there tomorrow,
translation.fr:
Je pense
que nous devrions nous y rendre,

translation.en: and then head out for the coast the following morning.
translation.fr:
puis partir pour la côte
le matin suivant.

translation.en: you didn't tell the team about your connection to Kane,
translation.fr: votre lien avec Kane aux autres,

translation.en: I wasn't sure if that was a good idea.

translation.fr: Mais après avoir vu cette vidéo...

translation.en: I'm not sure how they would have reacted to you.
translation.fr: Qui sait comment elles auraient réagi.

translation.en: Why did my husband volunteer for a suicide mission?
Is that what you think we're doing?

translation.fr: Il a dû dire quelque chose.

translation.en: So you're asking me as a psychologist.
translation.fr: C'est une question à la psychologue ?

translation.en: I'd say you're confusing suicide with self-destruction.
translation.fr:
que vous confondez suicide
et auto-destruction.

translation.en: Almost none of us commit suicide...
translation.fr: Presque personne ne commet de suicide,

translation.en: and almost all of us self-destruct.
In some way, in some part of our lives.
translation.fr: D'une certaine manière, à un moment donné.
Ce ne sont pas des décisions,

translation.en: In fact, you're probably better equipped to explain this than I am.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes d'ailleurs la mieux placée - pour en parler.
- Pardon ?

translation.en: Wake up, Josie, come on. Wake up. Something's happening.
translation.fr: Debout. Il se passe quelque chose.

translation.en: [Cassie] What happened? I heard a noise.
translation.fr:
- Lena ?
- Il y a eu un bruit.

translation.en: -Through the fence? -It's ripped open like a fucking zipper.
translation.fr:
- Traversé ?
- Y a un trou dans le grillage.

- Je n'y vois rien.
- Moi non plus.

translation.en: Sheppard was next to me. Something took her.
-[Cassie continues screaming] -Oh, fuck! Oh, fuck! Sheppard!
-We have to go back now. -[Anya] She's right.
-[sighs] -[Anya] We lost one of our own.
We have evidence the previous team went nuts and chopped each other up.
translation.fr:
La folie a poussé les précédents
à s'éviscérer.

translation.en: I really don't know how much more right she has to be.
translation.fr: Qu'est-ce qu'il vous faut de plus ?
On n'a pas atteint le phare.

translation.en: We still don't understand the cause or the nature of the Shimmer.
translation.fr: On ne connaît rien du miroitement.

translation.en: We have data, observations, photographs. She has hella footage.
translation.fr:
On a des données,
des photos, des vidéos...

translation.en: All of which makes the phenomenon less explicable, not more.
translation.fr:
Ce qui n'explique pas le phénomène,
mais l'obscurcit.

translation.en: I'm gonna get to the lighthouse,
and I'm fine going on my own.
translation.fr: et j'irai seule si besoin est.

translation.en: You just need to decide... whether you're coming with me or not.
It's like she hasn't noticed that Sheppard is dead.
translation.fr: La mort de Sheppard ne lui a rien fait.

translation.en: You know, and thanks for the fucking backup, Lena.
translation.fr: Merci pour ton putain de soutien, Lena.

translation.en: -I didn't realize there were sides. -[Anya] Yeah.
translation.fr: Parce qu'il y a des camps ?

translation.en: Okay, then I agree with you. We should go back.
translation.fr: Je suis d'accord, on devrait rentrer.

translation.en: Good. Okay, great. There we go. Okay?
-So the three of us can-- -[Lena] Hold on a minute.
But it took us, what, six days to get here?
translation.fr: Mais le voyage nous a pris six jours.

translation.en: And the coast is two days away.
translation.fr: La côte se trouve à deux jours d'ici.

translation.en: when we get to the coast, we can follow it until the perimeter wall.
translation.fr: une fois sur la côte, on aura qu'à la longer jusqu'au mur.

translation.en: You're saying we get out by going deeper?

translation.fr: Si tu veux le mettre comme ça, oui.

translation.en: This isn't some bullshit tactic to get us to the lighthouse, is it?
translation.fr:
C'est une stratégie
pour nous amener au phare ?

translation.en: This is not about the lighthouse, okay?
I believe that the coast is the best route out.
translation.fr:
La côte est
notre meilleure chance de rentrer.

translation.en: I didn't know what going back meant.
Why it would be safer than going forward.
translation.fr:
Rien ne garantissait
que ce serait plus sûr.

translation.en: [man] You didn't know, but you made a decision to continue as if you did.
translation.fr:
Vous ne saviez pas, mais
vous avez continué comme si vous saviez.

translation.en: [man] Ventress had cancer. She was never coming back.
translation.fr:
Elle avait un cancer,
elle n'allait pas rentrer.

translation.en: Fine. Just... leave me the fuck alone.

translation.fr: On se pose ici ce soir.

translation.en: It's another two hours' walk up the coast.
translation.fr: On est à deux heures de la côte.

translation.en: At first I thought the radio waves were blocked by the Shimmer,
translation.fr:
Je pensais que le miroitement bloquait
les ondes radio,

translation.en: and that's why no one inside could communicate with base or GPS,
translation.fr:
et que pour cette raison, personne
ne pouvait communiquer avec la base,

translation.en: but the light waves aren't blocked, they're refracted, and...
translation.fr:
alors qu'en fait, les ondes lumineuses
n'étaient pas bloquées, mais réfractées.
C'est pareil pour les ondes radio.

translation.en: know what you'd get if you sequenced it?
Hox? What is-- What's Hox mean?
They're the genes that define the body plan, the physical structure.
translation.fr:
Ce sont les gènes définissant
la structure physique du corps.

translation.en: And the plants have human body plan.
translation.fr:
Et les plantes ont
une structure humaine.

translation.en: Arms attached to shoulders. Legs to hips.
translation.fr: Des bras reliés aux épaules. Les jambes aux hanches.

translation.en: The Shimmer is a prism, but it refracts everything.
translation.fr:
Le miroitement est un prisme,
mais qui réfracte tout.

translation.en: Not just light and radio waves.
translation.fr: Pas juste les ondes radio et lumineuses.

translation.en: All right... I guess this is a bedroom.
You spend more time away from your husband than with him.
translation.fr:
Tu as passé plus de temps
loin de ton mari qu'avec lui.

translation.en: You can't talk to him about work, and he won't talk to you about his.
translation.fr:
Tu ne peux pas lui parler de ton travail,
et lui, du sien.

translation.en: And there is a clear physical and intellectual connection between us.
translation.fr:
Et il y a clairement une connexion
physique et intellectuelle entre nous.

translation.en: -Have I covered the bases? -You forgot your wife.
translation.fr:
Voici l'essentiel. - Tu oublies ta femme.
- J'aime ma femme.

- Tu oublies ta femme.
- J'aime ma femme.
Elle n'a rien à se reprocher.

translation.en: You think that something may have happened to him?
translation.fr: Tu penses qu'il lui est arrivé un truc ?

translation.en: You think somehow he's found out about our affair.
translation.fr: Tu penses qu'il a découvert notre liaison.

translation.en: I'm not interested in talking... or in anything you have to say.
translation.fr:
Je ne veux ni parler
ni écouter ce que tu as à dire.

translation.en: Just get dressed and get out.
You know, it's not me you hate, it's yourself.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas moi que tu hais,
mais toi-même.

translation.en: You don't get to ask that fucking question. You answer it!
translation.fr: Tu ne demandes rien, tu réponds !

translation.en: -[Anya] Why didn't you tell us? -[speaks indistinctly]
There are two theories of what went wrong.
One is that something in here killed them.
translation.fr: Un, quelque chose les a tués.

translation.en: Two... is that they went crazy and they killed each other.
translation.fr:
Deux, pris de folie,
ils se sont entre-tués.

translation.en: Josie nearly got killed by an alligator,
translation.fr: Un alligator a failli tué Josie

translation.en: and Cass did get killed by a bear. [voice breaks]
translation.fr: et un ours a tué Cass.

translation.en: So, yes, theory one, it fits.
I didn't actually see a bear.
[Anya] The only people who saw were Lena and Ventress.
translation.fr: Seules Lena et Ventress l'ont vu.

translation.en: So nothing's confirmed. Everything's on their word.
translation.fr:
Donc rien n'est confirmé. Tout repose sur leur parole,
sur la parole de Lena.

Tout repose sur leur parole,
sur la parole de Lena.

translation.en: is that Lena... is a liar.
translation.fr: c'est que Lena est une menteuse.

translation.en: Or do you think I've lost my shit and we're gonna fuck each other up?
translation.fr:
Ou c'est moi qui la perds
et on va s'entre-tuer ?

translation.en: When I look at my hands...
and you tie me to a chair and cut me open...
translation.fr: et que tu m'attaches et m'ouvres en deux,

translation.en: are my insides gonna move like my fingerprints?
translation.fr: est-ce que mes tripes vont bouger aussi ?

translation.en: But... I'm not the one tied to a chair.
translation.fr: Mais je ne suis pas attachée.

translation.en: -You said she was dead. -[Lena speaks indistinctly]
[in Cassie's voice] Help me! Help me!
-It's not even light yet. -I don't have time to wait.
translation.fr:
- Il ne fait pas encore jour.
- Pas le temps.

translation.en: Our bodies as fast as our minds. Can't you feel it?
translation.fr:
Corps et esprit.
Ne le sentez-vous pas ?

translation.en: It's like the onset of dementia.
translation.fr: C'est le début de la démence.

translation.en: If I don't reach the lighthouse soon...
translation.fr: Si je n'arrive pas vite au phare,

translation.en: the person that started this journey won't be the person that ends it.
translation.fr:
je ne serai plus la même personne
qu'au début du voyage.

translation.en: I want to be the one that ends it.
translation.fr: Or je veux être moi quand j'y arrive.

translation.en: How long was your husband in the Shimmer?
translation.fr: Ton mari est resté combien de temps ici ?

translation.en: Theoretically, as long as a year.
That's a long time to be inside and remain intact.
translation.fr:
Il y est resté longtemps
pour s'en être sorti intact.

translation.en: I'm not so sure he was intact.
translation.fr: Je n'en suis pas si sûre.

- au sujet des réfractions, non ?
- Oui.

translation.en: I checked my blood last night.
translation.fr: J'ai analysé mon sang hier soir.

translation.en: It will be in all of us.
Sheppard's voice in the mouth of that creature last night.
translation.fr:
la voix de Sheppard
s'échapper de cette bête.

translation.en: I think as she was dying, part of her mind became...
translation.fr:
Quand elle est morte,
une partie de son esprit

translation.en: part of the creature that was killing her.
translation.fr:
a dû fusionner avec la créature
qui la tuait.

translation.en: Imagine dying frightened and in pain,
translation.fr: Imagine une mort douloureuse et horrible,

translation.en: and having that as the only part of you which survives.
translation.fr: et c'est la seule part de toi qui survit.

translation.en: I wouldn't like that at all.
But I don't think I want either of those things.
translation.fr: Mais aucun de ces choix ne me plaît.

translation.en: One by one, all gone, except you.
translation.fr:
Disparues, les unes
après les autres, sauf vous.

translation.en: Is it something I need to explain?
I'm not sure any of them did.
translation.fr: Je crois que je suis la seule.

translation.en: ♪ You'll see something certain To tell you ♪
translation.fr: LE PHARE LA VIE IMMORTELLE D'HENRIETTA LACKS

translation.en: I thought I was a man.
And now I'm not so sure.
If I wasn't Kane, what was I?
translation.fr: Si je n'étais pas Kane, qu'étais-je ?

translation.en: You ever seen a phosphorus grenade go off? They're kind of bright.
translation.fr: T'as déjà vu une grenade détoner ? C'est lumineux.

translation.en: If you ever get out of here, you find Lena.
translation.fr: Si tu t'en sors, trouve Lena.

translation.en: That I needed to know what was inside the lighthouse.
translation.fr:
Que je devais savoir ce qui se trouvait
à l'intérieur du phare.

translation.en: I don't know what it wants.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas ce qu'il veut.

translation.en: will be fragmented into their smallest parts until...
translation.fr: seront fragmentés en tout petits morceaux jusqu'à leur disparition totale.

translation.en: I don't think it wanted anything.
I'm not sure it even knew I was there.
translation.fr:
Elle n'était pas consciente
de ma présence.

translation.en: It came here for a reason.
translation.fr: Le miroitement était là pour une raison.

translation.en: It was mutating our environment, it was destroying everything.
translation.fr:
Il faisait muter notre environnement,
détruisait tout.

translation.en: A team reached the lighthouse a few hours ago.
translation.fr:
Une équipe est arrivée
au phare il y a peu.
Tout a été réduit en cendres.

translation.en: If what you encountered was once alive...
translation.fr: Si cette chose a un jour vécu,

translation.en: Now will you tell me what happened to my husband?
his blood pressure stabilized and his pulse rate started to rise.
translation.fr:
sa tension artérielle s'est stabilisée
et son pouls s'est accéléré.

translation.en: A few hours later, he was not only awake,
translation.fr: Après quelques heures, il était conscient,
